thing-type.label: Heos Player
thing-type.description: The Heos Player represents a Heos Player like the HEOS 1, Heos 5, Link etc

parameter.name: pid
parameter.label: Player ID
parameter.description: The ID identifies the Heos Player.

parameter.name: model
parameter.label: Player Model
parameter.description: The model of the Heos Player.

parameter.name: version
parameter.label: Player Version
parameter.description: The version of the Heos Player.

channel-type.label: Add
channel-type.description: Add a Heos Player to the group of the given Heos Player

channel-type.label: Control
channel-type.description: Control the Heos Player, e.g. start/stop/next/previous/ffward/rewind

channel-type.label: Current Album
channel-type.description: Name of the album currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Artist
channel-type.description: Name of the artist currently playing

channel-type.label: Current Title
channel-type.description: Title of the song currently playing

channel-type.label: Source ID
channel-type.description: ID of the source playing

channel-type.label: Media ID
channel-type.description: ID of the media playing

channel-type.label: Current Track
channel-type.description: Name of the current track or radio station currently playing

channel-type.label: Favorite
channel-type.description: Play the given favorite entry. The favorite entry has to be predefined in the Sonos Controller app

channel-type.label: Led
channel-type.description: Set or get the status of the white led on the front of the Heos Player

channel-type.label: Line-in connected
channel-type.description: Indicator set to ON when the line-in of the Heos Player is connected

channel-type.label: Local Coordinator
channel-type.description: Indicator set to ON if the this Heos Player is the Zone Group Coordinator

channel-type.label: Mute
channel-type.description: Set or get the mute state of the master volume of the Heos Player

channel-type.label: Play Line-in
channel-type.description: Play the Line-in of the the Heos Player corresponding to the given UIN

channel-type.label: Play Playlist
channel-type.description: Play the given playlist. The playlist has to predefined in the Sonos Controller app

channel-type.label: Play Queue
channel-type.description: Play the songs from the current queue

channel-type.label: Play Track
channel-type.description: Play the given track number from the current queue

channel-type.label: Public Address
channel-type.description: Put all Heos Players in one group, and stream audio from the line-in from the Heos Player that triggered the command

channel-type.label: Radio
channel-type.description: Play the given radio station. The radio station has to be predefined in the Sonos Controller app

channel-type.label: Remove
channel-type.description: Remove the given Heos Player from the group of this Heos Player

channel-type.label: Snooze
channel-type.description: Snooze the running alarm, if any, with the given number of minutes

channel-type.label: Stand Alone
channel-type.description: Make the Heos Player leave its Group and become a standalone Heos Player

channel-type.label: State
channel-type.description: The State channel contains state of the Heos Player, e.g. PLAYING, STOPPED,...

channel-type.label: Stop
channel-type.description: Stop the Heos Player

channel-type.label: Volume
channel-type.description: Set or get the master volume

channel-type.label: Zone Group
channel-type.description: XML formatted string with the current zonegroup configuration

channel-type.label: Zone Group ID
channel-type.description: Id of the Zone Group the Heos Player belongs to

channel-type.label: Zone Name
channel-type.description: Name of the Zone Group the Heos Player belongs to
